uretse gusa abayobozi b'ibinyamitende nibo bashobora kurenga  umurongo wera udacagaguye
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho arenze umurongo wera  udacagaguye
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyuranaho mu gihe bitateza icyago
question: Mu gihe utwaye ikinyabiziga uva kuri A ugana kuri B, Iki kimenyetso kiri mu  muhanda kivuze iki ?

options: Metero 100 ku manywa na metero 20 mu ijoro
Metero 150 ku manywa na metero50 mu ijoro
Metero 200 ku manywa na metero100 mu ijoro
question: Itara ryo guhagarara ry'ibara ritukura rigomba kugaragara igihe ijuru rikeye nibura mu  ntera ikurikira:
Uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ntibushobora kurenga cy'uburemere  bw'ikinyabiziga gikurura nubw'umuyobozi kuri romoruki zikurikira :

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa ibinyabiziga bigenda bigomba kugira:
Niki wakora mugihe usanze mu bimenyetso bimurika harimo ibara ry'umuhondo.

options: Guhagarara umwanya munini n'umwanya moto ntibyemewe
question: Imbere yawe iki cyapa kikubwiye iki ?
Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?
Mu mujyi no ku mihanda y'igihugu igenwa na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu  n'ibintu, ubwikorere ntarengwa ku ikamyo iyo ariyo yose ntibushobora kurenga  ibipimo bikurikira:
Iyo umuvuduko w'ibinyabiziga bidapakiye ushobora kurenga km50 mu isaha  ahategamye, bigomba kuba bifite ibikoresho by'ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera:
Mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa w'imodoka zagenewe gusa gutwara abantu ni

options: Inzira yagenewe imodoka zipima hejuru ya toni 10 gusa
question: Iki cyapa gikoreshwa gute?
Inzira nyabagendwa ifite ibyerekezo bibiri, uruhande rw'ibumoso rudufasha iki ?
Mu mihanda yo mu mijyi ubwikorezi ntarengwa bwemewe ku mitambiko itatu  ifungirwaho ibiziga bine ni
Ahantu ho kugendera mu muhanda herekanwa n'ibimenyetso bimurika ibinyabiziga  ntibishobora kuhagenda :

options: Oya umuyobozi ntashobora kureba imbere neza
Yego kuko umurongo wera ucagaguye udashobora kuba udacagaguye
Yego abanyamagare bazumva imodoka bave munzira
Yego kuko buri kinyabiziga kiva mukindi cyerekezo gishobora kuguha inzira
question: Aha umuyobozi w' ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyura kuri aba abanyamagare?
Uretse mu mujyi, ku yindi mihanda yajyenwe na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu  n'ibintu, uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko itatu cyangwa irenga  hatarimo makuzungu ni

options: Itegure kureka uwo mwana w'umuhungu atambuke kuko yajya mu muhanda  atitaye ku kinyabiziga cyawe
Gabanya umuvuduko ubwire uwo mwana yambuke ukoresheje ibimenyetso
Komeza nkaho uwo mwana akiri munzira y'abanyamaguru
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yegereye aho umwana w'umuhungu utwaye akagare  k'abana asezera ku nshuti ye . N'iyihe myifatire myiza wagira imbere yabo?

kubyerengagiza wizeyeko nta mpanuka muri bukore
funga cyane umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago wawe

question: Igihe utwaye umuntu mu kinyabiziga cyawe, akibagirwa kwambara umukandara wo  kwirinda ibyago ugomba:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: Amezi 6 kubinyabiziga bikora ubucuruzi / Amezi 12 ku binyabiziga bidakora  ubucuruzi
